items.title: Perplexity reportedly raised $200M at $20B valuation
items.description: The AI-powered search startup's valuation jumped from $18 billion two months earlier.

items.title: Thinking Machines Lab wants to make AI models more consistent
items.description: In a blog post shared Wednesday, Mira Murati's startup offered a rare glimpse into some of work its doing to improve AI models.

items.title: How to turn off autoplay on your social media feeds
items.description: Here's how you can turn off autoplaying videos and GIFs on Facebook, Instagram, X, Twitter, and Threads.

items.title: While US stalls, Australia and Anduril move to put XL undersea vehicle into service
items.description: Anduril has landed a lucrative contract and is bringing its uncrewed undersea vehicle Ghost Shark to Australian waters next year.
